content: this very classic beanie pattern instructs you how to calculate your perfect stitch count in order to knit your new favorite beanie for all of your loved ones the marled effect is achieved by holding a solid colour together with a handyed multicolor yarn and of course you can use whatever colourways please your eyes we were surprised to find out that pretty much any colour combination turns out fantastic the beanie is knit from the bottom up the instructions explain a version with a single fold brim as well as a more voluminous double fold brim happy knitting yarn needed for adult single fold approx 50g per colour double fold approx 65g per colour 3mm circular needle with 40cm cable
